sentence.Network_en: Albinus was the greatest descriptive anatomist of the 18 th century.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿尔比努斯是最伟大的解剖学家描述了18世纪.

sentence.Network_en: He was an early anatomist, and was interested in geology , astronomy and hydraulics.
sentence.Network_cn: 他为机器人画出机械图;也是位最早的制图员之一.

sentence.Network_en: However Charles Sedgwick Minot, the anatomist who said those words, jumped the gun.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是美国科学发展协会第1902次会议上的开场演讲词.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语—医学 ... pathologist[ 病理学家] ▲ anatomist[ 解剖学家] ·- itis[ 炎症] ▲.
Multimedia English | CRIENGLISH ... 4.on average： 平均起来 5.anatomist： 解剖学家，剖析者 7.assertion： 主张，断言，声明.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French anatomiste, from a medieval Latin derivative of anatomizare (see anatomize)

entry.def: An anatomist is an expert in anatomy.

auth_sentence.content: Fuhlrott later worked with anatomist Hermann Schaaffhausen to study these bones.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fuhlrott later worked with anatomist Hermann Schaaffhausen to study these bones.

auth_sentence.content: Noticed by almost every pathological anatomist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Noticed by almost every pathological anatomist.

auth_sentence.content: His skull was intact and forensic anatomist Meiya Sutisno was able to reconstruct his face.
